com.netflix.genie.server.resources

Class JobResourceV0

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.resources.JobResourceV0

  • public class JobResourceV0
extends java.lang.Object
    Job REST Resource. This resource is responsible for launching jobs and providing information about their state.

    NOTE: Version 0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JobResourceV0.JobJAXBContextResolver
      Custom JAXB context resolver based for the job request/responses.

      • getJobs

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJobs(java.lang.String jobID,
                                java.lang.String jobName,
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String jobType,
                                java.lang.String status,
                                java.lang.String clusterName,
                                java.lang.String clusterId,
                                int limit,
                                int page)
        Get job info for given filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        jobID - id for job
        jobName - name of job (can be a SQL-style pattern such as HIVE%)
        userName - user who submitted job
        jobType - type of job - possible types Type.JobType
        status - status of job - possible types Type.JobStatus
        limit - max number of jobs to return
        page - page number for job
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code
